txt.en: 'We do not get many travellers down this road. Is there something that I can help you with? What could you possibly want down this way? The Avanc-lûth do not take kindly to duvodiad.\n\n'There is a small band of us here, but we ask for naught, nor do we need anything from you. If you insist, you may speak with Alun. He is leading a scouting party nearby.'

'Bethan sent you here, did she? Interesting. I am not certain that she was wise to do so, but we have naught we can hide here. The land is open as far as you can see, and there is not anything to see. Why would you even want to come here?\n\n'Perhaps you can prove that you would be a valuable ally to the Avanc-lûth. Food and supplies are scarce here, as you can see. Maybe you can help us gather some things.'
As you entered the Dunbog, you stumbled across the Avanc-lûth. You clearly get the sense that these people do not like strangers, nor do they want you anywhere within their bog.
Talk to Alun at the look-out camp
Alun is encamped to the south-west, near a large bent tree.\n\nBethan has asked you to talk to Alun if you wish to learn more about the people of Dunbog.
